Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,656,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/10/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.10 ERA...
7/28/1986: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $4,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 6/18/1987 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 8/13/1988 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
4/18/1989: Signed a minor league contract extension with Seattle...
7/13/1989: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $650,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 5/3/1991 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
